Result.Abstract: Economic analysis of law usually proceeds under the assumptions of neoclassical economics. Result.Title: A Behavioral Approach to Law and Economics

Result.Title: Is Capital Punishment Morally Required? The Relevance of Life-Life Tradeoffs
